sentences.en: A dentist may decide to extract the tooth to prevent recurrent trouble.
sentences.cn: 牙医可能会决定拔掉那颗牙，以免反复发作。

sentences.en: Add a teaspoon of vanilla extract to the juice.
sentences.cn: 在果汁中加一茶匙香草香精.

sentences.en: Add one teaspoon of vanilla extract.
sentences.cn: 加入一茶匙香草精。

sentences.en: Blend in the lemon extract, lemon peel and walnuts.
sentences.cn: 调入柠檬汁、柠檬皮和核桃。

sentences.en: He made the mistake of trying to extract further information from our director.
sentences.cn: 他犯了个错误，不该试图从我们的主管那里打探更多的信息。

sentences.en: He sought to extract the maximum political advantage from the cut in interest rates.
sentences.cn: 他试图从降息中牟取最大的政治好处。

sentences.en: I’ve only seen short extracts from the film.
sentences.cn: 我只是看过那部电影的一些小片段。

sentences.en: Language teachers often extract examples from grammar books.
sentences.cn: 语言教师常从语法书里摘录例子.

sentences.en: Mother flavours her custards with lemon extract.
sentences.cn: 母亲用柠檬汁给蛋糕加香味.

sentences.en: Oils are extracted from the plants.
sentences.cn: 从这些植物中提炼出油。

sentences.en: Read this extract from an information booklet about the work of an airline cabin crew.
sentences.cn: 看看这段从有关航空公司乘务人员工作的信息手册中摘录的文字。

sentences.en: The article was a choice extract from her writings.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章是从她的著作中摘录出来的精粹.

sentences.en: The following extract is taken from her new novel.
sentences.cn: 下面一段摘自她的新小说。

sentences.en: The information could be used as a bargaining chip to extract some parallel information from Britain.
sentences.cn: 这个情报可以当作筹码，从英国人那里换取等价的消息。

sentences.en: The threat of bankruptcy is a legitimate tool to extract money from them.
sentences.cn: 破产威胁是从他们那里索得钱款的合法手段。

sentences.en: This type of surgery could even be used to extract cancerous growths.
sentences.cn: 这种外科手术甚至可以用来切除癌性肿瘤。

sentences.en: We can extract oil from olive.
sentences.cn: 我们可以从橄榄中榨油.

sentences.en: We can extract oil from shale.
sentences.cn: 我们可以从页岩中提取石油.

sentences.en: We need to extract the relevant financial data.
sentences.cn: 我们需要摘录相关的财务数据。

sentences.en: You’ll have to have that tooth extracted.
sentences.cn: 你得把那颗牙拔掉。

trans.tran_en: a short piece of writing, music etc taken from a particular book, piece of music etc

trans.tran_cn: 提取，提炼，设法得到，选取，摘录，获得
trans.tran_en: to remove an object from somewhere, especially with difficulty
to remove an object from somewhere, especially with difficulty
